properties.title: Test your knowledge of R Graphics

children.value: Which of the following is a contributed R package?

That’s correct! ggplot2 was developed by Hadley Wickham as part of his
PhD.
No, this is a core package so it’s already installed.
No, this a core package and loads automatically when you launch R.
No, this a core package and loads automatically when you launch R.
Which R package actually renders the graphics in R?

Remember that there are two primary graphic models in R: the base and
grid graphics. Which one is ggplot2 using?

properties.title: Plotting two or more variables with ggplot2

children.value: For the following questions we are going to use

package which contains the budget share of food for Spanish
households. You can load the dataset and see the structure of the data
below.
The meaning of the variables are described below:

: percentage of total expenditure which the household has
spent on food
: age of reference person in the household

: size of the town where the household is placed categorized
into 5 groups: 1 for small towns, 5 for big ones

Try to recreate the scatter plot below. Is there anything unusual that
you notice about the plot?

frontmatter.title: Chapter 6: Data Visualisation with R
frontmatter.description:
This chapter will give you an introduction to the R graphics system and teach you how to get started with using the ggplot2 package for drawing all kind of plots.
Note: the slides may take some time before loading. Running your code for the first time will take long to initialise the container but subsequent runs will be faster.
